title: Team Task Management Application
summary: Develop a modern web application enabling small development teams to collaborate effectively on projects, featuring real-time updates, Kanban boards, and comprehensive task management functionalities.
intent: To provide a user-friendly and efficient task management solution for small development teams, fostering collaboration and improving project organization.
context: Small development teams (5-20 people) require a centralized platform for task assignment, tracking progress, and facilitating communication. Existing solutions often lack the specific features or scalability needed by these smaller groups.

requirements.description: Kanban board view with drag-and-drop functionality
Support for due dates, priorities, and labels on tasks
File attachment and commenting capabilities for tasks
Mobile-responsive design for accessibility across devices

constraints.description: Target user base: Small development teams (5-20 people)

success_criteria.description: User authentication successfully implemented with OAuth providers
Kanban board functionality allows for seamless task movement and organization
Application is accessible and functional on various mobile devices
